verbose_text: HSP27 is an intracellular antiviral factor against hepatitis B virus through the induction of type I interferon and downstream antiviral effectors 43 and inhibits caspase independent apoptosis.
evidence: HSP27 is an intracellular antiviral factor against hepatitis B virus through the induction of type I interferon and downstream antiviral effectors 43 and inhibits caspase-independent apoptosis
